job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: To help Trust scale our products and our team, we need an engineer that wants to step into a central role in our company. We are looking for an engineer whose work will focus on our core API but will involve projects up and down our stack.ResponsibilitiesWork with product owners to define functional and non-functional requirementsDesign software architecture and systems to meet specified requirementsWork closely with technical and non-technical team membersProduce documentation for software and systemsMaintain and improve the software as neededAssist in building a team of software developers (assist with hiring, mentorship, etc.)Required Qualifications3+ years of software development experience.Expertise with object-oriented programming languages. Particularly Python.Expertise with relational databases. Particularly PostgreSQLExperience with API frameworks (e.g. Flask, FastAPI, Ruby on Rails).Proven ability to design, build, and document APIsStrong technical communication skillsResults-focused, collaborative, and pragmaticNice-to-have QualificationsFinTech / Finance experienceFamiliarity / Expertise with FastAPI frameworkFamiliarity with Ops platforms tools and processes (AWS, GCS, etc.)Data pipeline experienceFamiliarity with Docker
